TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed UIControlEvent extends System.Enum

Docs.remarks: The list of events for UIControl objects.

.field public static literal valuetype MonoTouch.UIKit.UIControlEvent ApplicationReserved = unsigned int64(251658240)

Docs.summary: This mask describes the range of bytes available for application events. Any values within [0x01000000,0x0f000000] can be used as application specific events.

.field public static literal valuetype MonoTouch.UIKit.UIControlEvent TouchDragOutside = unsigned int64(8)
